description: Accelgor, known as the Deshelled or Shell Out Pok√©mon, is the evolution of Shelmet. It is based on a ninja, combined with a giant tube worm. In order to evolve Shelmet into Accelgor, one must be traded for a Karrablast. Shelmet`s shell is transferred to Karrablast, allowing Shelmet to evolve into Accelgor and Karrablast into Escavalier.
name: Agilder
